Name: ManholeCover
Notes: A manhole that can be flipped by Ground Pounding on top of it or by jumping through it from below.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: If used, the switch will be activated at all times and deactivated while it's flipping.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene.
